articles.title: Myanmar coup: Death toll rises as police crack down on protesters
articles.description: Police have fired on protesters in Myanmar, on the deadliest day since rallies against the country's coup began.
articles.content:
Police have fired on protesters in Myanmar, on the deadliest day since rallies against the country's coup began.
Deaths were reported in Yangon, Dawei and Mandalay.
